ActJudges Act
SubjectJoanna Linden ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Allen M. Linden **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to JOANNA LINDEN, survivor of the Hon. Allen M. Linden, a Judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, effective August 24, 2017.
